p:
The net reproductive rate (R 0), that is the cumulative summation of lxmx, is age-specific net maternity which is the product of lx (age-specific survival rate) and mx (age-specific fecundity), and was calculated as:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$R_{0} = \sum\limits_{x = 0}^{\infty } {l_{x} m_{x} }$$\end{document}
R 0
=
∑
x = 0
∞
l x
m x
